import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Button, Form, Header, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default function Stats() { const race = useSelector((state)=> state.race) const classSelection = useSelector((state)=> state.classSelection) return (
I see, a{race === 'elf' && 'n'} {race} {classSelection}!
Now for the finishing touches...
) }
